3: The final bionic was vaporized before you, and Lucia put her blade away.
The data you collected on Amberia from the battle just now... Was heavily fragmented and disorderly.
'Dreams' often don't conform to normal logic.
If you integrate the memory fragments, you may be able to piece together the whole picture.
Even if we can't see the whole picture, it's still unpleasant enough as is. Those poor people...
Lee suddenly stopped talking in an attempt to calm down.
Who doesn't want to wake up from this awful nightmare?
As Asimov said, let's put an end to the nightmare, Commandant.
